flawed_nl_solution:
Each employee needs $35000-$20000=$<<35000-20000=10500>>10500 more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay $10500*10=$<<10500*10=105000>>105000 extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of $1000000-$105000=$<<1000000-105000=895000>>895000 per year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15000, not 10500. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
